item.description: The Ron Paul Money Bomb to Surpass all other Moneybombs! The media has ignored, blacked out, downplayed and lied about Ron Paul and we are sick of it! Lets give the media something they cannot ignore, the largest one day online fundraiser in political history! On Oct. 19th, 1781 the British surrendered and we won the Revolutionary war.... 230 years later will be the day we win the Revolution for Ron Paul, without the media! Can we break the $6 million mark? I know we can if we get 25,000 attending this event!. So get the word out, invite your friends, family, make phone calls and canvas! Pledge here: http://blackthisout.c... RSVP here: http://www.facebook.c... DONATE ONLY TO: http://www.RonPaul201... Unless you've maxed out on donations, in which case I recommend: http://revolutionpac....
item.name: Black This Out Money Bomb!
